list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: pursue in order to catch or catch up with.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: police chased the stolen car through the city
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cảnh sát đuổi theo chiếc xe bị đánh cắp qua thành phố

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: drive or cause to go in a specified direction.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she chased him out of the house
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô đuổi anh ra khỏi nhà.

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: engrave (metal, or a design on metal).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they didn't have foundries to cast or chase metal
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Họ không có xưởng đúc để đúc hoặc đuổi theo kim loại

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an act of pursuing someone or something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they captured the youths after a brief chase
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Họ chiếm được những thanh niên sau một cuộc rượt đuổi ngắn ngủi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in letterpress printing) a metal frame for holding the composed type and blocks being printed at one time.
the part of a gun enclosing the bore.
a groove or furrow cut in the face of a wall or other surface to receive a pipe.
